name: UDynamicMesh
doc: UDynamicMesh is a UObject container for a FDynamicMesh3.

MeshModifiedBPEvent: Blueprintable event called when mesh is modified, in the same cases as OnMeshChanged
bEnableMeshGenerator: Controls whether the active Generator (if configured) will be applied when rebuilding the mesh

methods.name: GetTriangleCount
methods.doc: @return number of triangles in the mesh

methods.name: IsEmpty
methods.doc: @return true if the mesh has no triangles

methods.name: Reset
methods.doc:
Clear the internal mesh to an empty mesh.
This *does not* allocate a new mesh, so any existing mesh pointers/refs are still valid

methods.name: ResetToCube
methods.doc:
Clear the internal mesh to a 100x100x100 cube with base at the origin.
This this instead of Reset() if an initially-empty mesh is undesirable (eg for a Component)
